body_html:
I am hoping to extend the simple speech recognition example here to use transfer learning:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/tutorials/audio_recognition

I have also been collaborating with Nic Lane (currently at UCL, but moving to Oxford next month) about getting some accelerometer models into TensorFlow, so I'd love to chat more about what's possible here.

body:
I am hoping to extend the simple speech recognition example here to use transfer learning:
https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/tutorials/audio_recognition

I have also been collaborating with Nic Lane (currently at UCL, but moving to Oxford next month) about getting some accelerometer models into TensorFlow, so I'd love to chat more about what's possible here.
